scripts.check:coverage: yarn istanbul-combine -d coverage-merged -p detail -r html -r json coverage-*/coverage-final.json && istanbul check-coverage ./coverage-merged/coverage-final.json --statements 99 --branches 94 --functions 99 --lines 99
scripts.flatten:contracts: mkdir -p ./build/flattened/ && steamroller contracts/colonyNetwork/IColonyNetwork.sol > build/flattened/flatIColonyNetwork.sol && steamroller contracts/colony/IColony.sol > build/flattened/flatIColony.sol && steamroller contracts/reputationMiningCycle/IReputationMiningCycle.sol > build/flattened/flatIReputationMiningCycle.sol && steamroller contracts/colony/IMetaColony.sol > build/flattened/flatIMetaColony.sol && steamroller contracts/common/IRecovery.sol > build/flattened/flatIRecovery.sol && steamroller contracts/common/IEtherRouter.sol > build/flattened/flatIEtherRouter.sol
scripts.test:reputation: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && nyc truffle test ./test/reputation-system/* ./test/reputation-system/reputation-mining-client/* --network development
scripts.test:reputation:coverage: SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=1 truffle run coverage --solcoverjs ./.solcover.reputation.js --network coverage --temp build --file='./test/reputation-system/**/*'
scripts.test:contracts: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test ./test/contracts-network/* ./test/extensions/* --network development
scripts.test:contracts:chainid: npm run stop:blockchain:client && npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test ./test-chainid/*
scripts.test:contracts:chainid:coverage: SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=1 truffle run coverage --solcoverjs ./.solcover.chainid.js --network coverage --temp build --file='./test-chainid/**/*'
scripts.test:contracts:upgrade:parity: npm run start:blockchain:client parity & npm run generate:test:contracts && truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test ./test-upgrade/* --network integration
scripts.test:contracts:upgrade:ganache: npm run start:blockchain:client & npm run generate:test:contracts && truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test ./test-upgrade/* --network development
scripts.test:contracts:gasCosts: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test test-gas-costs/gasCosts.js --network development
scripts.test:contracts:patricia: npm run start:blockchain:client parity & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test packages/reputation-miner/patricia-test.js --network development
scripts.test:contracts:coverage: SOLIDITY_COVERAGE=1 truffle run coverage --network coverage --temp build --file='./test/{c,e}*/*'
scripts.test:contracts:watch: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle watch --network development
scripts.test:contracts:e2e: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle test test-system/end-to-end.js --network development
scripts.test:security:mythril: truffle run verify --mode quick --style json --limit 1 --swc-blacklist 101,123,128,131 > truffle-security-output.json; sed -i '/^\[{/!d' ./truffle-security-output.json && node ./scripts/process-truffle-security.js
scripts.pretest:contracts:upgrade:parity: sed -ie "s/eth-gas-reporter/mocha-circleci-reporter/g" ./truffle.js && rimraf ./truffle.jse && sed -i 's/this.config.resolver = new Resolver(config, true);/this.config.resolver = new Resolver(this.config, true);/g' ./node_modules/truffle/build/commands.bundled.js
scripts.posttest:contracts:upgrade:parity: npm run clean:test:contracts | npm run stop:blockchain:client
scripts.posttest:contracts:upgrade:ganache: npm run clean:test:contracts | npm run stop:blockchain:client
scripts.viz:bootstrap: npm run start:blockchain:client & truffle migrate --reset --compile-all && truffle exec --network development scripts/viz-bootstrap.js

hooks.pre-commit: yarn eslint-staged && yarn solhint-staged && yarn build:docs && git add docs
